title: Light blood oozing from his nose in a dream

preview.html: Sometimes a person sees a little blood coming out of his nose in a dream, and in fact this often happens in reality, due to some nasal infections, or colliding with something sharp, or if the person suffers from high blood pressure, but if it happens in reality we can find out the reason for this, but If it happened in a dream, what would be its interpretation, and this is what we will learn through today’s article on the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin The light of blood coming out of his nose in a dream Our respected scholar, Ibn Sirin, believes that seeing blood bleeding from the nose in a dream is one of the dreams that carries many Of the different interpretations and connotations, which change according to the color and quantity of blood seen by the dreamer. If the blood is bright red in color, and in a very small quantity, this is good news about the goodness that the fortuneteller will obtain, whether it is money, his success in work, or his success in Life in general. Light blood bleeding from the nose of an unmarried woman in a dream. If the unmarried girl sees blood flowing from her nose and is upset. This is a sign that she will go through a group of problems and she must be careful to get out of them. But if the blood is light in texture and light in color, it is considered A sign of the goodness and success that you will be able to achieve in life, the happiness that you will be pleased with, and the removal of all problems. This is disturbing you. As for the blood that comes out of the mouth of an unmarried woman, it is a sign that she follows corrupt words, which is slander and gossip. Conversely, if blood comes out of her ears, this is evidence of the presence of many enemies who remind her of evil. Light blood coming out of the nose of a married woman in a dream. Light, light blood. In a married woman’s dream, it is a sign of her ability to get rid of the problems and crises that she has experienced in her life. Perhaps this vision is evidence that he will get a lot of money and will be able to obtain high positions and be very successful in life. And blood is bleeding in a dream, if The woman felt comfortable and happy after it, as this is considered a sign of prosperity. But if a married woman is disturbed by blood in a dream, or if she finds it bursting lightly. Seeing it is a sign that she will suffer from many problems in her married life and a sign of her separation from her husband. And the blood that drips from her ear A married woman is a warning to avoid some people who speak ill of her. As for staying away from her sight, she is jealous of everything she sees, so she must always remember God for everything beautiful. Light blood bleeding from a pregnant woman’s nose in a dream. If a pregnant woman finds that her nose is bleeding and imagines The dream indicates that this is a sign of childbirth. Her dream is a sign of the difficulty of childbirth or some danger that her fetus may be exposed to, God forbid. As for the blood that comes out of the pregnant woman’s nose, it is pink in color and light in texture. It is considered a sign of the goodness and happiness that she will enjoy, and God will approve of it. Provided that she sees her fetus healthy and healthy. Vomiting blood in a pregnant woman’s dream is good news about her freedom from the pain and problems she suffered during pregnancy. Seeing blood coming out of the nose

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a dead mother alive in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead mother alive in a dream: There are problems that have solutions in life, while there are some things that happen that lead to a serious shock to a person and make life around him very bad, including the death of the mother, and therefore if the sleeper sees his dead mother alive Life is in a dream. He feels great joy and is reassured, even if just a little, by her presence and seeing her again. What are the keys to this dream? Follow us to find out its different interpretations. Interpretation of seeing a dead mother alive in a dream: If there are things that cause confusion and disturbance in sleep, such as some situations that he encounters at work or study and he sees his dead mother alive, then the dream means that he will reach guidance in the matter that he wants. And he teaches him. What he will deal with, i.e. the end of stress. Perhaps seeing a dead mother alive is one of the happy symbols of good news for a person, but there are situations in which it is not desirable for one to observe his mother over her, including her serious illness, great sadness, or the sight of her. Her crying loudly. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a dead mother alive in a dream. Ibn Sirin indicates that seeing a dead mother alive again in a dream symbolizes the presence of old desires that the person tried to achieve, but he faced many problems in them and abandoned them, but in the coming period he will be able access to it. And its achievement will be achieved, God willing. One of the good signs is for the student to see his dead mother while she is alive and talk to her, and if she also advises him to pay attention to studying, then he must stay in this subject and correct his situation in this matter so that he does not. Exposure to difficulties and problems related to his education. The Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Interpretation of Dreams Online in Google and get the correct interpretations.Interpretation of seeing a dead mother alive in a dream for a single woman. Ibn Shaheen says that the interpretation of a dream of a dead mother alive for a single woman shows the many worries that disappear from her life in a short time, so if she suffers with With her co-workers, this tense relationship becomes more comfortable and calm. He agrees with them. It should be noted that this dream symbolizes salvation from the debts that she owes. If she was in bad circumstances in the past, her situation will gradually improve and her salary will increase, and from here she will be able to pay off her debts and enjoy her life without problems again. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead mother alive in a dream for a single woman? An unmarried girl who sees her dead mother alive in a dream is a sign of great happiness and comfort that she will feel in the coming period after a period full of tension and anxiety. Also, seeing a dead mother alive in a dream indicates It also indicates that the dreamer achieves her dreams and aspirations that she sought so much, and if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that her deceased mother is alive and returning to life, and she was tired and sad, this symbolizes her need to pray and give alms to her soul. This vision indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing the sunset in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the sunset in a dream. The sun is a bright star, and seeing it in a dream indicates prestige, power, and a prestigious position, and the absence of the sun can indicate good and it can indicate bad. Dreaming of a single young man, a married man, and a woman, whether single, married, pregnant, or widowed, as well as a divorced woman, provides interpretations of the great imams of interpretation of visions and dreams, such as Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin in. In ancient and modern times, follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing the sunset in a dream by Imam Ibn Sirin? Watching the sunset indicates the renewal of life and the renewal of faith. Watching the sunset in the sky indicates the end of sorrows and worries and the beginning of a happier life. Seeing the sun red indicates the corruption of religion and morals. Dreaming of swallowing the sun indicates a decline in status, power and social standing. Whoever sees that he follows the sun and walks behind it until it disappears, it indicates the end of his term and the nearness of his death. Seeing the sun rising at the feet of the viewer indicates a new and new hope. Seeing the sun above us is a sign of hearing good news and a bright future for the monarch. Whoever sees that he is addressing the sun, or that the sun is addressing him, indicates the high position and position that the viewer will reach. What is the interpretation of seeing the sunset in a dream for a single woman? Seeing the sunset in a dream for a single woman shows that she is unable to perform her duties and has not achieved what she wants. Girl Watching the sunset indicates the breakup of an engagement or the end of a romantic relationship. What is the interpretation of a dream about a sunset for a married woman? Watching the sunset for a married woman shows that her condition has changed for the better. Watching the sunset on the horizon indicates the death of worry and sadness. Watching the sunset from the sunrise shows many fears and problems. Seeing A bright sunset for a married woman indicates illness and psychological problems. What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing a sunset at sea? Watching a sunset for a student indicates failure and failure in an exam. Seeing a sunset in a man’s dream indicates an accumulation of debts. Watching a sunset at the sea indicates the end of someone, whether It was good or bad. Watching the sunset over the sea until it disappears indicates anxiety, sadness and suffering. Seeing the sunset over the sea in a man or woman’s dream indicates a long life. What is the interpretation of seeing the sunset and the appearance of the moon? Watching the sunset and eclipse indicates a lack of feelings and emotions Seeing the appearance of the sun and the moon together in a dream for a single woman announces the marriage of an unmarried girl. If the dreamer sees that the sun has fallen to the earth, this indicates problems and crises in the dreamer’s life. Seeing the moon in the home indicates not returning. Whoever sees the sun and the moon bowing to him, reports the approval of the parents. What is the interpretation of a dream about a sunset for a pregnant woman? Seeing the sun in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a child who will enjoy an excellent position and status. Seeing the sun indicates a lot of goodness, success and justice for the Lord. We are pleased to see the site of your dream host about “interpretation of seeing a sunset” through Comments and the dream team will interpret your dream

title: Learn about the most important interpretations of seeing cows in a dream

preview.html: Seeing cows in a dream: Seeing cows in a dream calls for optimism about the arrival of goodness, prosperity, and good meanings that are reflected in the life of the dreamer. What does a person see in a dream? Ibn Sirina. Seeing cows in a dreamSeeing cows in a dream reflects many positive meanings and connotations such as goodness, nutrition, growth, and good conditions, but the meaning is precisely determined according to the details of what the dreamer sees. Joseph sometimes symbolizes the year. If one sees, for example, three cows, one is tempted for three years. Caring for a cow in a dream and letting it eat from the grass represents the material and moral stability in which the family lives and the enjoyment of its members in good health and complete prosperity, leaving them with a constant feeling of contentment and tranquility throughout the family. With it, and the lack of blessing in nutrition and goodness that comes to the house is what keeps the head of the family in overthinking all the time. Seeing cows in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin sees in a dream the interpretation of cows that it is an indicator of livelihood, goodness, and blessing in money and children. Breeding cows by a fortuneteller in a dream is a sign of doubling profit, increasing space, successful projects, completely changing the social level of the family for the better, and eating roast beef in a dream confirms these praiseworthy associations. And soon the fulfillment of desires and plans that a person has arranged for a long time and controlling cows indicates the dreamer’s ability to face difficulties and get rid of worries and problems that haunt him and deprive him of psychological peace. Go to the Secrets of Interpretation of Dreams website from Google and you will find all the interpretations you are looking for. Seeing cows In a dream for a single woman: Seeing cows in a dream for an unmarried woman means great opportunities and happy news await her if the cow is fat and looks good and prosperous. Besides this, if she is thin and weak, she resorts to obstacles and problems that come in her way. For a while, but soon it overcomes them. Seeing cows in a dream for a married woman. Seeing cows in a dream for a married woman indicates the quiet and stable family life that she enjoys with her life partner and that their lives are gradually changing for the better, materially and socially. The dream of buying a fat cow symbolizes successful projects and trade that The husband enters it and earns a lot of money as a result of hard work. Eating its meat in a dream indicates the prosperity and security that he feels in his life, but if the cow is thin, then this is a sign of money. The hardship they are going through at that time. Seeing cows in a pregnant woman’s dream. Cows in a pregnant woman’s dream are signs of abundant goodness that enters her home with the arrival of this child and opens with him the doors of livelihood so that the family can enjoy a stable and peaceful life. On the other hand, the weakness of the cow and not benefiting from it indicates the deterioration of the viewer’s health condition and lack of attention to the doctor’s instructions. Seeing cows in a dream for a divorced woman. Absolute seeing cows in a dream gives birth to a woman.

title: Interpretation of a dream about an eye in a dream - seeing an eye in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an eye in a dream Interpretation of seeing what is around the eye in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. In a dream, seeing around the eye in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. To learn more about Ali, Mozat website in the interpretation of dreams. Interpretation of seeing around the eye in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin. The eye: indicates everything that his eye knows of, whether the money of an eye, a son, a brother, a father, a prince, or a president. What It descended on her body, or lost its place, or was thrown at it with darts and darts. The incidents are the ones that reach the one who points to it from what we have described. The same applies to what is on the right and left sides of the limb, because the right is preferred over the left. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the eye if one sees during his sleep He suffers from blurred vision or double vision, it means that he cannot. He has made a decision in his life and his life is characterized by instability no matter what. However, this person cannot distinguish what is good or bad for him and what is not He spoke with any logic, and his words are contradictory and baseless. He cannot confront anyone, and God knows best. As for the one who sees in his dream that his vision is strong and sharp like the vision of a falcon, his interpretation is the opposite of that. Exactly the previous interpretation, as this indicates that this The person has a strong and attractive personality and has a vision. He is strong and his speech is free of hypocrisy and praise. He speaks fluently and logically. He is seen in a man’s sleep. It symbolizes intelligence. As for the sharp vision in a woman’s dream, it symbolizes her wisdom and insight into matters, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a blindfolded man. Interpretation of a dream about eyes. If a person sees in a dream that he is walking with his eyes closed or blindfolded, then this is the case. It indicates that he will undergo some experience and will strongly desire to prove himself and himself from During it. The experience, whether this proof of oneself is moral or material, as this person can be referred to. He tries to see for himself whether he will be able to succeed on his own and without relying on him. The mother must turn to people to help her, and God knows best. The eye with which he sees varies. The person during sleep is different from the actual eye that the person sees in reality. The eye in the dream expresses the heart, soul, and insight, as we mentioned. Whoever sees that the eye of the beast is looking at him, that is. This means that this person is subjected to severe criticism by people and they want to overthrow him, abuse him, and eliminate him. But he will be able to overcome all this hatred and spite that he sees from them, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a magic eye in a dream. Seeing a magic eye in a dream represents that person’s ability to sense danger from those around him, especially the danger of the person betraying him, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an eye disease In a dream, among the known diseases that affect the eyes are the eyes, strabismus, or blindness. Seeing eye disease in a dream indicates disease of the heart and soul, so eye disease in a dream indicates that person. He does not believe in God’s blessing upon him and ignores the truth. As for seeing an impure eye in a dream, it means It means corruption of morals and religion, and it appears that this person is arrogant, and God knows best. preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Qamar in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Today on the Moments website, we present to you everything that is new and distinctive in this article. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fight in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a quarrel in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. The dream of quarrels and fighting in a dream is considered one of the disturbing dreams that distracts the viewer’s attention and he wants to know the interpretation of the dream of seeing a fight. In a dream, which is a sign that appears, the interpretation of a dream about fighting varies from one person to another, depending on the social status of the fortuneteller. There is a big difference in the situation of fighting and the person with whom the quarrel occurred, and there are the most famous dream interpreters whose interpretations people turn to are Dr. Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin, and here Interpretation of the dream of seeing a fight in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a fight in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin is one of the most prominent dream interpreters in the Arab countries, and whom people consider a reference for the interpretation of dreams. Here is the interpretation of the dream of seeing a fight in a dream by Ibn Sirin: It indicates fears, disagreements, and problems. A quarrel indicates the presence of an enemy for the dreamer. A quarrel with the father indicates tension, anxiety, and loneliness. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a fight in a dream in Nabulsi. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi expressed seeing a quarrel in a dream as one of Negative feelings that cause a lot of anxiety and stress to the dreamer, especially when he dreams of seeing quarrels and quarrels in a dream with relatives. Here is the interpretation of a dream about fighting in Nabulsi’s dream as follows: A quarrel in a dream, as interpreted by Al-Nabulsi, indicates worry and worry. It indicates a lack of trust in people and large differences of opinion. Seeing a quarrel in a dream with one’s family indicates many problems and bad morals for the pioneer. Fighting In a dream with women symbolizes problems in life. What does fighting in a dream mean? Fighting in a dream means many interpretations that have been interpreted by many interpreters, and the dream of seeing a fight in a dream has been interpreted in many things. To see a fight symbolizes trouble. The dream in which you see a fight symbolizes psychological pressure. Disagreements between married couples indicate anger, fear, and anxiety. Sometimes a dream about a fight is the result of events that a person experiences during his day. There was a meeting at the fortune teller between the interpreters, where they will see Nabulsi, the interpretation of the dream of seeing a fight in a dream is that it is one of the strange dreams. What does it mean to fight with parents in a dream? Many people are searching for the meaning of a fight with the family in a dream. Among the interpretations that Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi interpreted in a dream is seeing quarrels with the family. What is the meaning of a quarrel with the family in a dream: The meaning of a quarrel with the family in a dream means stumbling in many matters of life. A quarrel with the family in a dream indicates a close confrontation with enemies. What is the interpretation? A quarrel in a dream for a married woman? Sometimes many disagreements occur between spouses, which reflects this in their lives and becomes a dream in their minds out of fear of separation and others. The interpretation of a quarrel in a married woman’s dream differs from the person around whom the quarrel is taking place, and what is the interpretation of a quarrel in a married woman’s dream: The dream of seeing a quarrel in a dream for a married woman with her husband was interpreted as a sign of love between her and her husband.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing coconut in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: Coconut is among the distinctive fruits that are grown in tropical regions, so it may not spread throughout the world, but some people see coconuts in a dream and are confused whether this vision is good or not, so we will look at the different interpretations around it with the interpretation of seeing coconuts. In a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream: I eat snake eggs in a dream... wealth and end of pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing a coconut in a dream for one girl. If an unmarried girl sees herself taking a coconut from one of her acquaintances, this indicates that this person has a desire to get married. Including. For a girl who is suffering from emotional problems with her lover at the present time, the fruits of walnuts foretell that she will end the disputes with her lover and marry her soon. Ibn Sirin says that coconuts are among the foods that indicate the fulfillment of difficult desires easily for the dreamer. If this girl is a student, then Seeing a coconut in a dream foretells that she will get excellent grades this year. Picking coconuts in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates that this girl will marry the person she loves and desires. Interpretation of the dream: I eat snake meat in a dream... expanding livelihood and debts. Interpretation of seeing a coconut in a dream for a married woman: Al-Nabulsi says that a coconut in a dream indicates the emotional stability of this woman. Coconut fruits also indicate improved financial conditions and the acquisition of abundant money in the coming days. Dream interpreters argue that marking coconut fruits as white indicates the coming of Happy and joyful occasions for this lady. If this lady is suffering from some problems and arguments with her husband now, then seeing a coconut portends the end of those problems. Interpretation of dreams for feeling hungry in a dream... the end of crises and a close marriage. Interpretation of seeing a coconut in a dream for a pregnant woman: cutting A pregnant woman trying to cut a coconut from the outer shell indicates that this woman went through some problems during childbirth. While Imam Al-Sadiq says that the coconut heralds this woman that she is pregnant with a child that will be of great benefit to society. Eating a grated coconut in a dream indicates ease. Giving birth to this woman, and it may be evidence of the safety and health of herself and the fetus due to the white color that characterizes the coconut. Interpretation of a dream about surfing a table in a dream... marriage soon and the birth of a girl. Interpretation of seeing a coconut in a dream for a manIf a man eats a coconut in a dream, it may mean that That he will get a lot of money without putting in any effort or hardship. If this person is suffering from some material difficulties or financial problems at the present time, the coconut fruit foretells that he will get rid of these crises. Buying a coconut in a dream indicates that many Positive changes will occur in the next stage of this person’s life. Some dream interpreters believe that coconut fruits indicate a good opportunity to travel on the dreamer’s path. Interpretation of seeing balloons in a dream: success in work and life crises. Interpretation of visions

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing a date in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Learn about the interpretations of seeing dates in a dream. Eating dates is a Sunnah of ours, may God bless him and grant him peace. Many of us, when we see dates in a dream, search through Internet sites for the correct and accurate interpretation, so that whoever sees you will have to interrupt his vision because it came in a dream to reach the accurate interpretation today, from Through this site we will present to you the greatest scholars and interpreters of dreams. Dream of dating for single women. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is selling dates and people will buy from her, this is evidence of that girl’s purity and chastity, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing dates in a dream for a single woman for a son Ibn Sirin interprets seeing dates in a dream by unmarried women as a sign of the abundance of good things that will happen in her life because she is good and doing many good things in her life. If the dreamer sees dates in her dream, this is a sign of good events that will happen around her that will make her in A very good situation and she will be very satisfied with it. If the dreamer sees an appointment in her dream, this represents the accomplishment of many things that she has been dreaming of for a long time and this will make her in a state of great happiness. Seeing an appointment in her dream symbolizes the good news that will reach her, which will improve her psychological state It raises her morale significantly. If a girl sees a date in her dream, this is a sign of the abundance of money that she will receive, which will make her live her life the way she loves. What is the interpretation of a dream about eating bread with dates for a single woman? Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream eating bread with dates while she is engaged, indicates Until the date of her marriage contract is approaching and a completely new phase will begin in her life that will be filled with many things that she has never experienced before. Before. If the dreamer sees during her sleep that she is eating bread with dates, this is a sign of the changes that will occur in many aspects of her life, which will be very satisfying for her. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is eating bread with dates, this expresses the good events that will happen around her. Which will make her psychological conditions good. For the dreamer to see in her dream that she is eating bread with dates symbolizes that she will receive a marriage proposal from a person who has many of the characteristics that she wants, and this will make her agree to it immediately. If a girl dreams that she is eating bread with dates while she is a student, this is a sign of her superiority. In her studies and obtaining the highest grades that her family will be proud of. What does it mean to give a date in a dream to a single woman? Seeing unmarried women dating in a dream symbolizes her good qualities that make her very dear to the hearts of many around her and everyone around her always tries to get close to her. If During sleep, the dreamer saw that she is making appointments, then this is a sign of her intention to help others around her all the time and provide support to them when needed, and this makes it a special place for everyone. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is giving dates, then this expresses the many benefits that she will enjoy in the future. her life in the coming days

title: Interpretation of seeing cheating and deception in a dream, and revealing a conspiracy in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cheating and deception in a dream is one of the bad dreams that leave a bad impact on the souls of its owners, because being exposed to cheating and deception in reality is one of the annoying things that causes the feeling of the theft of rights. And injustice. Interpretation of seeing fraud and deception in a dream. Interpretation of seeing fraud and deception in a dream has many interpretations among the great dream interpreters, as follows: Whoever sees in his dream deception through money, this is a sign that the dreamer is going through a difficult experience in which he is deceived in reality by those close to him. If he sees in his dream that he is deceiving others with money, this is a sign that he has more hatred and hate for others. Whoever sees in his dream that he is deceiving another person and taking a banknote from him, this is a sign that he will soon have a child, God willing. Interpretation of the revelation of a conspiracy in a dream. Intrigue and deception from The vile qualities that people hate in reality, so when a person sees them in his dreams, he becomes terrified by such dreams, but the interpretation of revealing the conspiracy in a dream differs from one person to another, in that article we will learn about these differences in their interpretation. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi interpreted the interpretation of the revelation The conspiracy in a dream has different interpretations, including the vision that may indicate the concealment of its owner or the priest’s involvement with enemies and their fear, and it may indicate the renewal of the covenant between him and whomever. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of revealing deception is that the one who is deceived is victorious and will achieve his dreams, and the deceiver is oppressed and disappointed. The dream is experiencing financial hardship, and will be released in the next few days, which also indicates the end of problems and disputes for the dreamer. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of seeing a wig in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a cheater for a man If a man sees that he has been cheated and deceived by a person holding a high position, This indicates the appearance of financial problems and many debts on the insightful, and a dream about a cheater for a man may indicate a sharpening of the differences between him. As for a man seeing that he is being deceived by an unknown person, this is a warning that there are hypocrites and cheaters around him, and seeing cheaters exposed in a man’s dream indicates the presence of an intimate companion. From insight who has malice and hatred in reality. Interpretation of a dream about a monument in a dream for a single woman: A separated girl’s dreams are related to thinking about her emotional and professional life and entering into her marriage, and therefore this vision highlights some important implications for a single woman’s dream, which are as follows: Whoever saw the monument in her dream In general, this is a sign that she is going through a difficult test and must pass it, and this vision can be interpreted that one of her close friends is planning evil and destruction. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is trying to deceive another person, this is a sign that she is harming one of her relatives in reality. Interpretation of a dream Deceiving friends in a dream This vision is one of the different visions that show different connotations depending on the circumstances and condition of the dreamer. Therefore, we present to you the most important interpretations of this vision as follows: Anyone who sees in his dream that he is focusing on...
